I think that the entire array of behaviors shown by this robot are 
beyond =
anything that EC on its own can evolve today.  However, EC 
certainly could=
 have been a part of optimizing a subset of the 
behaviors or their associa=
ted parameters (which is basically what 
they did at UT Austin).

I do beli=
eve that EC will be able to evolve capabilities like these 
in the future e=
ntirely on its own.  However, so far we haven't seen 
that happen.

ken
